title: Air France to meet unions as strike hits flights
text:
Air France to meet unions as strike hits flights 5:19pm BST - 01:26 
Air France unions leading a strike on Wednesday over wage demands have agreed to meet management for further negotiations after the airline improved its salary offer. Silvia Antonioli reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Air France unions leading a strike on Wednesday over wage demands have agreed to meet management for further negotiations after the airline improved its salary offer. Silvia Antonioli reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2qrd5Wj
